
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VRgbToYuv.cpp
          VRgbToYuv.h
          VRgbToYuv__Syms.cpp
          VRgbToYuv__Syms.h
  DEPENDS RgbToYuv.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/RgbToYuv.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VRgbToYuv STATIC VRgbToYuv.cpp VRgbToYuv__Syms.cpp
    RgbToYuv.v
)

target_compile_options(VRgbToYuv PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VRgbToYuv PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VRgbToYuv verilated)
